keys.string: Start
I know that I’m supposed to choose a mentor, but I think this is more important.
[None]No
a
[None]Yes

I approach Ryn’s door. Heart thumping, palms sweaty, mom’s spaghetti. Nervous on more than just the surface. Should I do this? Really? I swallow my nerves and knock on the door. I can’t believe I’m doing this. I can just run now. That is if my legs weren’t turning to jelly.
Oh hi [NAME].
Uh hi...
I’m just frozen like an idiot.
You know you can come in my room. We see each other every day.
Oh yeah I know that I just forgot... for a second.
Yeah. You can sit down if you want. I looks like you need to.
Oh no I hope he doesn’t think I’m too weird. Quick just think of an excuse.
I just gave blood.
Oh you need some food?
No I also just ate.
Ok well if you change your mind, let me know. Anyway what did you want?
I wanted to talk to you.
Check.

Well about other things also. I’ve been meaning to apologize to you for taking your cactus. I really didn’t know you when I took it, and now that I do you’re such a nice guy that I really shouldn’t have. So I brought you a replacement cactus.
Oh you really didn’t have to. But thank you so much.
Yeah I don’t know anything about cacti but this one was on sale at Lowes.
That’s a Mammillaria Spinosissima. Some people call it an Irish Gentleman because of it’s red spines.
That’s really cool actually. Glad to know that.
Sometimes I come in with that knowledge bomb.
I was also hoping you would help we with VR again.
Really you’ve picked up that class almost as well as I have, and I don’t even know if you have a background in unity.
Well you know, It’s always good to run ideas by your friends.
So we’re officially friends now.
I think I’m about to blush. Did he call me his friend and a gentleman? I’m definitely reading too much into it. Ok me, stay cool.
You’ve been so helpful to me coming here. Of course we’re friends. We wouldn’t be anything else.
We wouldn’t?
OK. HE’S GOT TO KNOW RIGHT. THIS MAN IS TAUNTING ME.
We...
We what?
Whatever you’re thinking. You can just say.
Well I uh think I like you.
Ya think?
Ok I KNOW I like you but I’m not sure how you feel.
Give me moment.
Oh no I totally blew it. He’s stalling to let me down lightly. It’s fine this won’t be too awkward. Right. We can still be friends. Right?
I told you how I name all my cacti right. What do you think I should name this one?
Well the one I took was named Kevin. You could make this one Kevin the Second.
I was thinking of something else.
Hmmm... You seem to be besties with Seth. Maybe you should name it after him.
That’s not actually a bad idea. You have no idea why I named my old cactus Kevin do you?
It’s because it looks like the pickle from Spongebob.
That was a sea cucumber, and no that’s not the reason. Do you want me to give you a hint?
Yeah sure. I don’t think I’m gonna get it though.
Well I think I’m going to name the new one [NAME].
oh. OH. OOOHH. I think I get it now.
So is that a yes?
It’s a yes.
And I’m counting the club as our first date.
Does that make this our second date?
Do you want it to be?
Yeah that would be nice.
Ryn leans in and I close my eyes.

ArrayOfString.string: [Narrator][Dialog]I know that I’m supposed to choose a mentor, but I think this is more important.
[Narrator][Option]Do you wish to continue? You cannot go back.
[None]No
[None]Yes
[Ryn][End]a

[Narrator][Dialog]I approach Ryn’s door. Heart thumping, palms sweaty, mom’s spaghetti. Nervous on more than just the surface. Should I do this? Really? I swallow my nerves and knock on the door. I can’t believe I’m doing this. I can just run now. That is if my legs weren’t turning to jelly.
[Ryn][Dialog]Oh hi [NAME].
[Player][Dialog]Uh hi...
[Narrator][Dialog]I’m just frozen like an idiot.
[Ryn][Dialog]You know you can come in my room. We see each other every day.
[Player][Dialog]Oh yeah I know that I just forgot... for a second.
[Ryn][Dialog]Yeah. You can sit down if you want. I looks like you need to.
[Narrator][Dialog]Oh no I hope he doesn’t think I’m too weird. Quick just think of an excuse.
[Player][Dialog]I just gave blood.
[Ryn][Dialog]Oh you need some food?
[Player][Dialog]No I also just ate.
[Ryn][Dialog]Ok well if you change your mind, let me know. Anyway what did you want?
[Player][Dialog]I wanted to talk to you.
[Ryn][Dialog]Check.

[Player][Dialog]Well about other things also. I’ve been meaning to apologize to you for taking your cactus. I really didn’t know you when I took it, and now that I do you’re such a nice guy that I really shouldn’t have. So I brought you a replacement cactus.
[Ryn][Dialog]Oh you really didn’t have to. But thank you so much.
[Player][Dialog]Yeah I don’t know anything about cacti but this one was on sale at Lowes.
[Ryn][Dialog]That’s a Mammillaria Spinosissima. Some people call it an Irish Gentleman because of it’s red spines.
[Player][Dialog]That’s really cool actually. Glad to know that.
[Ryn][Dialog]Sometimes I come in with that knowledge bomb.
[Player][Dialog]I was also hoping you would help we with VR again.
[Ryn][Dialog]Really you’ve picked up that class almost as well as I have, and I don’t even know if you have a background in unity.
[Player][Dialog]Well you know, It’s always good to run ideas by your friends.
[Ryn][Dialog]So we’re officially friends now.
[Narrator][Dialog]I think I’m about to blush. Did he call me his friend and a gentleman? I’m definitely reading too much into it. Ok me, stay cool.
[Player][Dialog]You’ve been so helpful to me coming here. Of course we’re friends. We wouldn’t be anything else.
[Ryn][Dialog]We wouldn’t?
[Narrator][Dialog]OK. HE’S GOT TO KNOW RIGHT. THIS MAN IS TAUNTING ME.
[Player][Dialog]We...
[Player][Dialog]We what?
[Ryn][Dialog]Whatever you’re thinking. You can just say.
[Player][Dialog]Well I uh think I like you.
[Ryn][Dialog]Ya think?
[Player][Dialog]Ok I KNOW I like you but I’m not sure how you feel.
[Ryn][Dialog]Give me moment.
[Narrator][Dialog]Oh no I totally blew it. He’s stalling to let me down lightly. It’s fine this won’t be too awkward. Right. We can still be friends. Right?
[Ryn][Dialog]I told you how I name all my cacti right. What do you think I should name this one?
[Player][Dialog]Well the one I took was named Kevin. You could make this one Kevin the Second.
[Ryn][Dialog]I was thinking of something else.
[Player][Dialog]Hmmm... You seem to be besties with Seth. Maybe you should name it after him.
[Ryn][Dialog]That’s not actually a bad idea. You have no idea why I named my old cactus Kevin do you?
[Player][Dialog]It’s because it looks like the pickle from Spongebob.
[Ryn][Dialog]That was a sea cucumber, and no that’s not the reason. Do you want me to give you a hint?
[Player][Dialog]Yeah sure. I don’t think I’m gonna get it though.
[Ryn][Dialog]Well I think I’m going to name the new one [NAME].
[Narrator][Dialog]oh. OH. OOOHH. I think I get it now.
[Player][Dialog]So is that a yes?
[Ryn][Dialog]It’s a yes.
[Ryn][Dialog]And I’m counting the club as our first date.
[Player][Dialog]Does that make this our second date?
[Ryn][Dialog]Do you want it to be?
[Player][Dialog]Yeah that would be nice.
[Narrator][Dialog]Ryn leans in and I close my eyes.
[Narrator][Scene]EndGame(Win)
